title: Is the 14-Night ‘Bora Bora Getaway’ on Facebook Real?
subtitle: A viral Facebook post asked users to like, share, and comment to enter for a chance to win a 14-night getaway to Bora Bora.
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: A 14-night "Bora Bora Getaway" circulating on Facebook in early 2021 is legitimate.
